coins.distinguishing_features: ["First year American Silver Eagle", ".999 fine silver composition", "40.6mm diameter largest US silver coin", "Liberty Walking obverse design", "No mint mark (Philadelphia)"]
coins.identification_keywords: american silver eagle ase 1986 liberty walking bullion fine silver
coins.notes: First year of issue, no proofs produced
coins.obverse_description: Liberty Walking design by Adolph A. Weinman, Liberty striding toward sunrise with olive branch and flag
coins.reverse_description: Heraldic eagle design by John Mercanti, eagle with shield and arrows, 13 stars above
